reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress well-made with sturdy fabric and appreciate its flattering design, with one noting how it accentuates the waist and back.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful smocked dress!
items.body: I love this dress! I wear a size 6 or 8 so I ordered the medium because I wanted the bottom of the smocking to hit at the waistline and it fits perfectly. I ordered the purple and the material is very lovely, not thin or cheap. It is very well made and the elastic in the sleeves makes the puffy sleeves even prettier. It is a very feminine dress. I have a small torso so the smocking was not tight but just right to show off my waistline. The elastic smocking will accent your torso, front and back, so be aware of that. I was honestly surprised at how lovely the material is. A beautiful dress if you want to feel feminine and show off the curves of your upper body! Read more
items.author: D.G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful, light weight and appropriately modest!
items.body: I was afraid, because it was not cotton, that this dress would make me hot- but I wore it all day during my church service (LDS Temple) and was happy with how comfortable it is and the unexpected compliments I received!! It has pockets and is modest in every way. I’m 5’5” and it comes to my ankles. The under slip is thick (nice for a white dress) but only comes to my knees. I wear another slip under it to get more coverage. The smocked bodice was a nice fit (it actually looked too small at first- I’m 140# and got a medium). I love this dress after having worn it just once! I did wash it (polyester fabric) to get rid of wrinkles and found they did not disappear- so be sure to iron it once and follow the care instructions after. Very good value for the cost and I’m sure it will last through many wears. Read more
items.author: L C Gibbons

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality
items.body: This dress is made very nicely. The quality is 100% it is lined and the material is very nicely. Love it. Color is a true navy. Not see through. It is nice and warm. It is past my knees for length and I’m 5’4 Read more
items.author: Stacy Allen

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Adorable and spooky
items.body: I got an 2xl, I am 6'1" and about 235lbs. It got up to mid calf and the sleeves are long. I with the sleeves were a little more puffy, but nonetheless it fits well. Material is a little stiff however after a while becomes more comfortable to wear. Personally will need to add a belt or something but recommend it. I love how it makes me feel Victorian and a bit spooky, definitely an add to my closet. Read more
items.author: Megan

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Pretty, but uncomfortable
items.body: This was the dress in the pile I bought that I labeled, “acceptable, but could be better.” It looked decent on, and I could have used it for family pictures, but I knew I’d want to peel it off immediately after. I knew I’d never want to wear it again because of how stiff and uncomfortable it was. It’s higher quality than any of the other Amazon dresses I tried. It has a liner, the material is nice and thick, and it’s very acceptable. But I returned it because I knew I’d never want to re wear it. Read more
items.author: Brian Barnhart

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Na
items.body: Pretty color Great fit Read more
items.author: Very cute contact case

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress
items.body: Bought this dress for my mom. She looks fabulous! Hoping to get in more colors! Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Dress Ever
items.body: When my daughter-in-law showed up at Church wearing this dress, I knew I just had to have one. Since sizing is “iffy” with almost all brands, I ordered the same black dress in two different sizes with the intention of keeping the one with the best fit and returning the other (in order to trade it for one in an additional color). Well, I’m keeping both dresses and I still want to order additional colors because this is the best style in my entire wardrobe. I love the breathable fabric and that the dress is lined. I’m grateful for the full-length sleeves (all the way to the wrist) and that the dress itself is a to-the-ankle length. The bodice is smocked (Nice!) and the neckline is feminine and attractive. Read more
items.author: Lucinda

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Bean Paste Red, Grey Blue, Army Green, Black, Dark Green, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, White, Purple, Royal Blue, S-green, Rose Pink, S-blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
